about_the_game:
The land has been overrun by evil dragons It needs a leader to bring peace to the land. Start by clicking on the dragon to kill them, and collect coins. Spend that coin on your power and allied Heroes to get more damage. The more damage you deal, the more coins you will get.

The more upgrades you unlock, the faster you deal damage to dragons!

In this DLC you will find 7 new enemy Dragons, get ready to destroy them!

Features:
• Unlock and upgrade to generate stacks of coins
• Fight against Legendary Dragons
• Fun Idle clicker gameplay
• Level up your power and your allied Heroes
• Beautiful Pixel graphics
• Simple but addictive gameplay
• More Dragon enemies will increase with this DLC

Idle Dragon Clicker Supports Multiple Styles ⭐
➤ ACTIVE: Click or tap to defeat Dragons☝
➤ PASSIVE: Let allied Heroes automatically defeat Dragons💸

Now that you know the basics, go ahead and start destroying dragons!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
